scripts.test: rimraf .nyc_output coverage && concurrently "yarn test:core" "yarn test:orm-query" "yarn test:orm-connector" "yarn test:socket" "yarn test:service" "yarn test:orm-service-wrap"
scripts.build: yarn build:core && yarn build:orm-common && concurrently "yarn build:orm-query" "yarn build:orm-connector" "yarn build:socket-common" && concurrently "yarn build:socket-server" "yarn build:socket-client" && concurrently "yarn build:service-container" "yarn build:service-interface" && yarn build:orm-service-wrap
scripts.test:core: rimraf coverage/core .nyc_output/core && cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tests/core/tsconfig.json cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --report-dir coverage/core --temp-directory .nyc_output/core --include packages/core/src/** --reporter html --reporter text --extension .ts mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register tests/core/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:orm-query: rimraf coverage/orm-query .nyc_output/orm-query && cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tests/orm-query/tsconfig.json cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --report-dir coverage/orm-query --temp-directory .nyc_output/orm-query --include packages/orm-query/src/** --reporter html --reporter text --extension .ts mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register tests/orm-query/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:orm-connector: rimraf coverage/orm-connector .nyc_output/orm-connector && cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tests/orm-connector/tsconfig.json cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --report-dir coverage/orm-connector --temp-directory .nyc_output/orm-connector --include packages/orm-connector/src/** --include packages/orm-common/src/** --reporter html --reporter text --extension .ts mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register tests/orm-connector/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:socket: rimraf coverage/socket .nyc_output/socket && cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tests/socket/tsconfig.json cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --report-dir coverage/socket --temp-directory .nyc_output/socket --include packages/socket-client/src/** --include packages/socket-server/src/** --include packages/socket-common/src/** --reporter html --reporter text --extension .ts mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register tests/socket/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:service: rimraf coverage/service .nyc_output/service && cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tests/service/tsconfig.json cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --report-dir coverage/service --temp-directory .nyc_output/service --include packages/service-container/src/** --include packages/service-interface/src/** --reporter html --reporter text --extension .ts mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register tests/service/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:orm-service-wrap: rimraf coverage/orm-service-wrap .nyc_output/orm-service-wrap && cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tests/orm-service-wrap/tsconfig.json cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --report-dir coverage/orm-service-wrap --temp-directory .nyc_output/orm-service-wrap --include packages/orm-service-wrap/src/** --reporter html --reporter text --extension .ts mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register tests/orm-service-wrap/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.build:core: tslint -c packages/core/tslint.json -p packages/core/tsconfig-build.json -t msbuild && rimraf packages/core/dist && tsc --project packages/core/tsconfig-build.json
scripts.build:orm-common: tslint -c packages/orm-common/tslint.json -p packages/orm-common/tsconfig-build.json -t msbuild && rimraf packages/orm-common/dist && tsc --project packages/orm-common/tsconfig-build.json
scripts.build:orm-query: tslint -c packages/orm-query/tslint.json -p packages/orm-query/tsconfig-build.json -t msbuild && rimraf packages/orm-query/dist && tsc --project packages/orm-query/tsconfig-build.json
scripts.build:orm-connector: tslint -c packages/orm-connector/tslint.json -p packages/orm-connector/tsconfig-build.json -t msbuild && rimraf packages/orm-connector/dist && tsc --project packages/orm-connector/tsconfig-build.json
scripts.build:socket-common: tslint -c packages/socket-common/tslint.json -p packages/socket-common/tsconfig-build.json -t msbuild && rimraf packages/socket-common/dist && tsc --project packages/socket-common/tsconfig-build.json
scripts.build:socket-server: tslint -c packages/socket-server/tslint.json -p packages/socket-server/tsconfig-build.json -t msbuild && rimraf packages/socket-server/dist && tsc --project packages/socket-server/tsconfig-build.json
scripts.build:socket-client: tslint -c packages/socket-client/tslint.json -p packages/socket-client/tsconfig-build.json -t msbuild && rimraf packages/socket-client/dist && tsc --project packages/socket-client/tsconfig-build.json
scripts.build:service-container: tslint -c packages/service-container/tslint.json -p packages/service-container/tsconfig-build.json -t msbuild && rimraf packages/service-container/dist && tsc --project packages/service-container/tsconfig-build.json
scripts.build:service-interface: tslint -c packages/service-interface/tslint.json -p packages/service-interface/tsconfig-build.json -t msbuild && rimraf packages/service-interface/dist && tsc --project packages/service-interface/tsconfig-build.json
scripts.build:orm-service-wrap: tslint -c packages/orm-service-wrap/tslint.json -p packages/orm-service-wrap/tsconfig-build.json -t msbuild && rimraf packages/orm-service-wrap/dist && tsc --project packages/orm-service-wrap/tsconfig-build.json
